00092 class CSimpleSocket {
00093 public:
00095     typedef enum 
00096     {
00097         Receives = SHUT_RD, 
00098         Sends = SHUT_WR,    
00099         Both = SHUT_RDWR    
00100     } CShutdownMode; 
00101 
00103     typedef enum  
00104     {
00105         SocketTypeInvalid,   
00106         SocketTypeTcp,       
00107         SocketTypeUdp,       
00108         SocketTypeRaw        
00109     } CSocketType;
00110 
00112     typedef enum 
00113     {
00114         SocketError = -1,          
00115         SocketSuccess = 0,         
00116         SocketInvalidSocket,       
00117         SocketInvalidAddress,      
00118         SocketInvalidPort,         
00119         SocketConnectionRefused,   
00120         SocketConnectionTimeout,   
00121         SocketEwouldblock,         
00122         SocketNotconnected,        
00123         SocketEinprogress,         
00124         SocketInterrupted,         
00125         SocketConnectionAborted,   
00126         SocketProtocolError,       
00127         SocketFirewallError,       
00128         SocketInvalidSocketBuffer, 
00129         SocketConnectionReset,     
00130         SocketAddressInUse,        
00131         SocketEunknown
00132     } CSocketError;
00133

00287 
00288     bool SetSocketExpedited(void)
00289     {
00290         bool bRetVal = true;
00291 
00292         if (IsSocketValid())
00293         {
00294             int32 nDscp = 0xb8;
00295 
00296             if (setsockopt(m_socket, IPPROTO_IP, IP_TOS, &nDscp, sizeof(nDscp)) == SocketError)
00297             {
00298                 TranslateSocketError();
00299                 bRetVal = false;
00300             }
00301         }
00302 
00303         return bRetVal;
00304     };
00305 #endif 
00308         int GetSocketDscp(void);
00309 
00314         bool SetSocketDscp(int nDscp);
